item.title: Un véritable vélo électrique SUV : on a testé le Diamant Suvea Style, un VTC boosté par Bosch et ultra bien équipé
item.description: S’il confirme un superbe agrément de conduite et de belles performances lors de notre essai, le Diamant Suvea Style est un VTC électrique très cher qui fait payer le GPS ou encore son astucieuse barre supérieure amovible. Nous l'avons testé, voici notre avis.

item.title: ChatGPT isn’t the only chatbot pulling answers from Elon Musk’s Grokipedia
item.description: ChatGPT is using Grokipedia as a source, and it's not the only AI tool to do so. Citations to Elon Musk's AI-generated encyclopedia are starting to appear in answers from Google's AI Overviews, AI Mode, and Gemini, too. Data suggests that's on the rise, heightening concerns about accuracy and misinformation as Musk seeks to reshape […]

item.title: Does wireless charging kill your phone’s battery? Scientists explain the pros and cons of going cable-free
item.description: Wireless charging feels effortless, but some users worry it could damage their phone's battery. Experts explain how it works and if there’s any truth to the myth.

item.description: All the ways to watch Leeds vs Arsenal live streams online and from anywhere, as the Gunners look to tighten their grip on top spot.

item.title: How to turn on hypertension alerts on Apple Watch
item.description: Apple has steadily expanded the Apple Watch’s health monitoring features over the years, moving beyond fitness tracking into areas that can offer early insight into potential medical concerns. One of the most recent additions is hypertension alerts, which are designed to notify users when their blood pressure trends are elevated over time. While Apple Watches cannot directly measure blood pressure, this feature can still play a useful role in highlighting patterns that may be worth discussing with your doctor. Here, we’ll explain what hypertension alerts do, how they work and how to enable and...

item.title: Cordless Stick Vacuum Throw Down: Bosch, Shark, Dyson (2026)
item.description: Bosch’s Unlimited 10 combines key features from Dyson’s and Shark’s stick vacuums and packs some nice extras, but it can’t seem to keep debris inside.

item.description: My guide to a selection of the top tech items worth buying if you're planning to host a Super Bowl party this year, including TVs, appliances, soundbars, games, and more.

item.title: Moins de 50 € en poche pour la fin des soldes ? Voici les 8 meilleurs deals sans se ruiner

item.title: Highguard, a hyperpop arena shooter and other new indie games worth checking out
item.description: Welcome to our latest roundup of what's going on in the indie game space. There are tons of interesting games out this week. But first, there's been some discourse around the Nintendo Switch version of Dispatch, which arrived this week as well.On other platforms, there's an option to censor genitalia and other explicit content, but that's not present in the Switch version. Instead, such content is censored by default, with black rectangles covering up characters' bits and someone flipping the bird. Noises that suggest sexual pleasure are said to be toned down too."We worked with Nintendo to en...

item.title: Why a Tennessee proposal to ban sports betting on campus is too little, too late
item.description: States spent years rolling out the red carpet for online sportsbooks. Now lawmakers are attempting to cordon off an industry designed to be everywhere. In the months after a 2018 Supreme Court decision opened the door for states to legalize sports betting within their borders, giddy lawmakers across the country couldn’t move quickly enough. No one wanted to miss out on the billions of dollars in tax revenue that the high court had suddenly placed within their reach—or, worse yet, to watch that easy money go to neighboring states whose leaders had the presence of mind to move first. Within a mo...
